00057 extern unsigned int main_flags;
00058 
00060 unsigned int flag_errors = 0;
00061 
00065 void event_set_error(unsigned char error_type, unsigned char state) {
00066         if (state == 0)
00067                 flag_errors &= ~(1<<error_type);
00068         else
00069                 flag_errors |= (1<<error_type);
00070         
00071         main_update_ptt_status();
00072 }
00073 
00075 unsigned char event_get_errors(void) {
00076         return(flag_errors);
00077 }
00078 
00082 unsigned char event_get_error_state(unsigned char error_type) {
00083         if (flag_errors & (1<<error_type))
00084                 return(1);
00085 
00086         return(0);
00087 }
00088 
00091 void event_internal_comm_parse_message(UC_MESSAGE message) {
00092         //Init the sequence of saving all data and disable all outputs activated by this unit
00093         switch(message.cmd) {
00094                 case INT_COMM_TURN_DEVICE_OFF:
00095                         if (!computer_interface_is_active()) {
00096                                 //TODO: Problem with delay here, need to wait until everything is shut off
00097                                 //This solution is pretty uggly...do it some other way?
00098                                 status.current_display = CURRENT_DISPLAY_SHUTDOWN_VIEW;
00099                                 display_shutdown_view();
00100                                 
00101                                 main_save_settings();
00102                                 
00103                                 band_ctrl_change_band(BAND_UNDEFINED);
00104                                 
00105                                 //TODO: Send global shutdown broadcast message three times
00106                                 
00107                                 send_ping();
00108                                 
00109                                 event_add_message((void *)shutdown_device,3000,0);
00110                         }
00111                         else {
00112                                 status.current_display = CURRENT_DISPLAY_SHUTDOWN_VIEW;
00113                                 display_shutdown_view();
00114 
00115                                 delay_s(2);
00116 
00117                                 shutdown_device();
00118                         }
00119                         
00120                         break;
00121                 case INT_COMM_PS2_KEYPRESSED:
00122                         event_handler_process_ps2(message.data[0]);
00123                         break;
00124                 case INT_COMM_PC_CTRL:
00125                         remote_control_parse_command(message.data[0],(unsigned char)message.data[1], (char *)(message.data+2));
00126                         break;
00127                 case INT_COMM_GET_BAND_BCD_STATUS:
00128                         if (message.data[0] != radio_get_current_band()) {
00129                                 if ((message.data[0] >= BAND_UNDEFINED) && (message.data[0] <= BAND_10M))
00130                                         radio_set_current_band(message.data[0]);
00131                         }
00132                         break;
00133                 default:
00134                         break;
00135         }
00136 }
00137 
00140 void __inline__ event_set_rx_antenna(unsigned char ant_index) {
00141         status.selected_rx_antenna = ant_index;
00142         
00143         antenna_ctrl_change_rx_ant(status.selected_rx_antenna);
00144         main_flags |= (1<<FLAG_UPDATE_DISPLAY);
00145 }
00146 
00149 void event_handler_process_ps2(unsigned char key_code) {
00150         char func_index = -1;
00151         
00152         if (key_code == KEYPAD_BTN_0)
00153                 func_index = 0;
00154         else if (key_code == KEYPAD_BTN_1)
00155                 func_index = 1;
00156         else if (key_code == KEYPAD_BTN_2)
00157                 func_index = 2;
00158         else if (key_code == KEYPAD_BTN_3)
00159                 func_index = 3;
00160         else if (key_code == KEYPAD_BTN_4)
00161                 func_index = 4;
00162         else if (key_code == KEYPAD_BTN_5)
00163                 func_index = 5;
00164         else if (key_code == KEYPAD_BTN_6)
00165                 func_index = 6;
00166         else if (key_code == KEYPAD_BTN_7)
00167                 func_index = 7;
00168         else if (key_code == KEYPAD_BTN_8)
00169                 func_index = 8;
00170         else if (key_code == KEYPAD_BTN_9)
00171                 func_index = 9;
00172         else if (key_code == KEYPAD_BTN_A)
00173                 func_index = 10;
00174         else if (key_code == KEYPAD_BTN_B)
00175                 func_index = 11;
00176         else if (key_code == KEYPAD_BTN_C)
00177                 func_index = 12;
00178         else if (key_code == KEYPAD_BTN_D)
00179                 func_index = 13;
00180         else if (key_code == KEYPAD_BTN_E)
00181                 func_index = 14;
00182         else if (key_code == KEYPAD_BTN_F)
00183                 func_index = 15;
00184         else if (key_code == KEYPAD_BTN_G)
00185                 func_index = 16;
00186         
00187         unsigned char curr_task = ext_key_get_assignment(func_index);
00188         
00189         /* Requires that we dont change the order of the functions */
00190         if ((curr_task >= EXT_CTRL_SEL_RX_ANT1) && (curr_task <= EXT_CTRL_SEL_RX_ANT10)) {
00191                 event_set_rx_antenna(curr_task);
00192                 return;
00193         }       
00194         
00195         //TODO: Continue with implementation of ext keypad functions
00196         
00197         switch(curr_task) {
00198                 case EXT_CTRL_SEL_NONE:
00199                         //Do nothing
00200                         break;
00201                 case EXT_CTRL_TOGGLE_TX_ANT1:
00202                         event_tx_button1_pressed();
00203                         break;
00204                 case EXT_CTRL_TOGGLE_TX_ANT2:
00205                         event_tx_button2_pressed();
00206                         break;
00207                 case EXT_CTRL_TOGGLE_TX_ANT3:
00208                         event_tx_button3_pressed();
00209                         break;
00210                 case EXT_CTRL_TOGGLE_TX_ANT4:
00211                         event_tx_button4_pressed();
00212                         break;
00213                 case EXT_CTRL_TOGGLE_RX_ANT_MODE:
00214                         event_rxant_button_pressed();
00215                         break;
00216                 default:
00217                         break;
00218         }
00219 }
00220 
00222 void event_pulse_sensor_up(void) {
00223         if (status.current_display == CURRENT_DISPLAY_MENU_SYSTEM) {
00224                 menu_action(MENU_SCROLL_UP);
00225         }
00226         else {
00227                 //If the knob function is RX ANT SELECT then go up the list of 
00228                 //RX antennas
00229                 if (status.knob_function == KNOB_FUNCTION_RX_ANT) {
00230                         if (status.selected_rx_antenna < (antenna_ctrl_get_rx_antenna_count()))
00231                                 status.selected_rx_antenna++;
00232                         else
00233                                 status.selected_rx_antenna = 1;
00234                 
00235                         //Set a flag that we wish to update the RX antenna, if the PULSE_SENSOR_RX_ANT_CHANGE_LIMIT time has passed
00236                         main_flags |= (1<<FLAG_CHANGE_RX_ANT);
00237                         main_flags |= (1<<FLAG_UPDATE_DISPLAY);
00238                 }
00239                 else if (status.knob_function == KNOB_FUNCTION_SELECT_BAND) {
00240                         if (status.new_band < BAND_10M)
00241                                 status.new_band++;
00242                 }
00243                 else if ((status.knob_function == KNOB_FUNCTION_SET_HEADING) && ((status.function_status & (1<<FUNC_STATUS_SELECT_ANT_ROTATE)) == 0)) {
00244                         if (status.new_beamheading < (antenna_ctrl_get_start_heading(status.antenna_to_rotate-1) + antenna_ctrl_get_max_rotation(status.antenna_to_rotate-1)))
00245                                 status.new_beamheading += status.rotator_step_resolution;
00246                         else
00247                                 status.new_beamheading = antenna_ctrl_get_start_heading(status.antenna_to_rotate-1);
00248                                         
00249                         display_show_set_heading(status.new_beamheading, 0);
00250                 }
00251                 else if (status.knob_function == KNOB_FUNCTION_SET_SUBMENU) {
00252                         if (main_get_inhibit_state() != INHIBIT_NOT_OK_TO_SEND_RADIO_TX) {
00253                                 sub_menu_pos_up(status.sub_menu_antenna_index);
00254                                 
00255                                 main_flags |= (1<<FLAG_CHANGE_SUBMENU);
00256                                 display_show_sub_menu(status.sub_menu_antenna_index, sub_menu_get_type(status.sub_menu_antenna_index));
00257                         }
00258                 }
00259         }
00260 }
00261 
00263 void event_pulse_sensor_down(void) {
00264         if (status.current_display == CURRENT_DISPLAY_MENU_SYSTEM) {
00265                 menu_action(MENU_SCROLL_DOWN);
00266         }
00267         else {
00268                 //If the knob function is RX ANT SELECT then go down the list of 
00269                 //RX antennas
00270                 if (status.knob_function == KNOB_FUNCTION_RX_ANT) {
00271                         if (status.selected_rx_antenna > 1)
00272                                 status.selected_rx_antenna--;
00273                         else
00274                                 status.selected_rx_antenna = antenna_ctrl_get_rx_antenna_count();
00275                 
00276                         //Set a flag that we wish to update the RX antenna, if the PULSE_SENSOR_RX_ANT_CHANGE_LIMIT time has passed
00277                         main_flags |= (1<<FLAG_CHANGE_RX_ANT);
00278                         main_flags |= (1<<FLAG_UPDATE_DISPLAY);
00279                 }
00280                 else if (status.knob_function == KNOB_FUNCTION_SELECT_BAND) {
00281                         if (status.new_band > BAND_UNDEFINED)
00282                                 status.new_band--;
00283                 }       //TODO: Fix all the rotator options properly
00284                 else if ((status.knob_function == KNOB_FUNCTION_SET_HEADING) && ((status.function_status & (1<<FUNC_STATUS_SELECT_ANT_ROTATE)) == 0)) {
00285                         if (status.new_beamheading > antenna_ctrl_get_start_heading(status.antenna_to_rotate-1))
00286                                 status.new_beamheading -= status.rotator_step_resolution;
00287                         else
00288                                 status.new_beamheading = antenna_ctrl_get_start_heading(status.antenna_to_rotate-1) + antenna_ctrl_get_max_rotation(status.antenna_to_rotate-1);
00289                         
00290                         display_show_set_heading(status.new_beamheading, 0);
00291                 }
00292                 else if (status.knob_function == KNOB_FUNCTION_SET_SUBMENU) {
00293                         if (main_get_inhibit_state() != INHIBIT_NOT_OK_TO_SEND_RADIO_TX) {
00294                                 sub_menu_pos_down(status.sub_menu_antenna_index);
00295                                 
00296                                 main_flags |= (1<<FLAG_CHANGE_SUBMENU);
00297                                 display_show_sub_menu(status.sub_menu_antenna_index, sub_menu_get_type(status.sub_menu_antenna_index));
00298                         }
00299                 }
00300         }
00301 }
00302 
00304 void event_update_display(void) {
00305         if (status.current_display == CURRENT_DISPLAY_ANTENNA_INFO) {
00306                 //Should we show the RX antenna?
00307                 if (status.function_status & (1<<FUNC_STATUS_RXANT))
00308                         display_show_rx_ant(status.selected_rx_antenna);
00309                 else
00310                         display_show_rx_ant(0);
00311                         
00312                 display_update(status.selected_band, status.selected_ant);
00313         }
00314         else if (status.current_display == CURRENT_DISPLAY_LOGO) {
00315                 glcd_print_picture();
00316         }
00317         else if (status.current_display == CURRENT_DISPLAY_MENU_SYSTEM) {
00318                 menu_show();
00319         }
00320 }
00321 
00323 void event_poll_buttons(void) {
00324         status.buttons_current_state = ih_poll_buttons();
00325         
00326         //Any change? If so then parse what change
00327         if (status.buttons_last_state != status.buttons_current_state) {
00328                 unsigned int btn_status = status.buttons_current_state ^ status.buttons_last_state;
00329                 
00330                 //event_parse_button_pressed(status.buttons_current_state ^ status.buttons_last_state);
00331                         //Checks if the status of this antenna button was changed
00332                 if (btn_status & (1<<FLAG_BUTTON1_TX_BIT)) {
00333                         if (status.buttons_current_state & (1<<FLAG_BUTTON1_TX_BIT))
00334                                 event_tx_button1_pressed();
00335                 }
00336 
00337         //Checks if the status of this antenna button was changed
00338                 if (btn_status & (1<<FLAG_BUTTON2_TX_BIT)) {
00339                         if (status.buttons_current_state & (1<<FLAG_BUTTON2_TX_BIT))
00340                                 event_tx_button2_pressed();
00341                 }
00342         
00343         //Checks if the status of this antenna button was changed
00344                 if (btn_status & (1<<FLAG_BUTTON3_TX_BIT)) {
00345                         if (status.buttons_current_state & (1<<FLAG_BUTTON3_TX_BIT))
00346                                 event_tx_button3_pressed();
00347                 }
00348         
00349         //Checks if the status of this antenna button was changed
00350                 if (btn_status & (1<<FLAG_BUTTON4_TX_BIT)) {
00351                         if (status.buttons_current_state & (1<<FLAG_BUTTON4_TX_BIT))
00352                                 event_tx_button4_pressed();
00353                 }
00354                         if (btn_status & (1<<FLAG_BUTTON_ROTATE_BIT)) {
00355                         event_rotate_button_pressed();
00356                 }
00357                 
00358                 if (btn_status & (1<<FLAG_BUTTON_RXANT_BIT)) {
00359                         event_rxant_button_pressed();
00360                 }
00361         
00362                 if (btn_status & (1<<FLAG_BUTTON_SUBMENU_BIT)) {
00363                         event_sub_button_pressed();
00364                 }
00365                 
00366         //Check if the MENU button has been pressed
00367                 if (btn_status & (1<<FLAG_BUTTON_MENU_BIT)) {
00368                         if (status.buttons_current_state & (1<<FLAG_BUTTON_MENU_BIT)) {
00369                                 if (status.current_display == CURRENT_DISPLAY_MENU_SYSTEM) {
00370                                         if (status.selected_band != BAND_UNDEFINED) {
00371                                                 status.current_display = CURRENT_DISPLAY_ANTENNA_INFO;
00372                                                 status.current_display_level = DISPLAY_LEVEL_BAND;
00373                                         }
00374                                         else
00375                                                 status.current_display = CURRENT_DISPLAY_LOGO;
00376                                                 
00377                                                 led_set_menu(LED_STATE_OFF);
00378                                 }
00379                                 else {
00380                                         menu_reset();
00381                                         status.current_display = CURRENT_DISPLAY_MENU_SYSTEM;
00382                                         led_set_menu(LED_STATE_ON);
00383                                 }
00384                         
00385                                 main_update_display();
00386                         }
00387                 }
00388         
00389                 if (btn_status & (1<<   FLAG_BUTTON_PULSE_BIT)) {
00390                         if (status.buttons_current_state & (1<< FLAG_BUTTON_PULSE_BIT)) {
00391                                 if (status.current_display == CURRENT_DISPLAY_MENU_SYSTEM)
00392                                         menu_action(MENU_BUTTON_PRESSED);
00393                                 else if (status.knob_function == KNOB_FUNCTION_SELECT_BAND) {
00394                                         status.current_band_portion = BAND_LOW;
00395                                         band_ctrl_change_band(status.new_band);
00396                                         
00397                                         display_update_radio_freq();
00398                                         send_ping();
00399                                 }
00400                                 else if (status.knob_function == KNOB_FUNCTION_SET_HEADING) {
00401                                         if (status.antenna_to_rotate != 0) {
00402                                                 antenna_ctrl_rotate(status.antenna_to_rotate-1,status.new_beamheading);
00403                                         
00404                                                 led_set_rotate(LED_STATE_OFF);
00405                                                 status.function_status &= ~(1<<FUNC_STATUS_ROTATE);
00406                                 
00407                                                 status.function_status &= ~(1<<FUNC_STATUS_SELECT_ANT_ROTATE);
00408                                                 status.antenna_to_rotate = 0;
00409                                 
00410                                                 set_knob_function(KNOB_FUNCTION_AUTO);
00411                                         
00412                                                 glcd_clear();
00413                                                 main_update_display();
00414                                         }
00415                                 }
00416                                 else if (status.knob_function == KNOB_FUNCTION_SET_SUBMENU) {
00417                                         //If we press the rotary knob while selecting sub menu we exit the sub menu. This
00418                                         //is so that the function is equal to other functions of the device
00419                                         led_set_submenu(LED_STATE_OFF);
00420                                         status.function_status &= ~(1<<FUNC_STATUS_SUBMENU);
00421                                         set_knob_function(KNOB_FUNCTION_AUTO);
00422                                 
00423                                         status.current_display_level = DISPLAY_LEVEL_BAND;
00424                                 
00425                                         glcd_clear();
00426                                         main_update_display();
00427                                 }
00428                         }
00429                 }
00430                 
00431                 if (btn_status & (1<<FLAG_BUTTON_AUX2_BIT)) {
00432                         if (status.buttons_current_state & (1<<FLAG_BUTTON_AUX2_BIT))
00433                                 event_aux2_button_pressed();
00434                 }
00435         }
00436         
00437         status.buttons_last_state = status.buttons_current_state;
00438 }
00439 
00441 void event_poll_ext_device(void) {
00442         status.ext_devices_current_state = ih_poll_ext_devices();
00443         
00444         if (status.ext_devices_current_state != status.ext_devices_last_state) {
00445                 event_parse_ext_event(status.ext_devices_current_state ^ status.ext_devices_last_state);
00446         }
00447         
00448         status.ext_devices_last_state = status.ext_devices_current_state;
00449 }
00450 
00452 void event_tx_button1_pressed(void) {
00453         if (main_get_inhibit_state() != INHIBIT_NOT_OK_TO_SEND_RADIO_TX) {
00454                 if (antenna_ctrl_get_flags(0) & (1<<ANTENNA_EXIST_FLAG)) {
00455                         unsigned char new_ant_comb = status.selected_ant;
00456                         
00457                         if ((status.function_status & (1<<FUNC_STATUS_SELECT_ANT_ROTATE)) == 0) {
00458                                 if (status.selected_ant & (1<<0)) {
00459                                         new_ant_comb &= ~(1<<0);
00460                                                 
00461                                         if (antenna_ctrl_comb_allowed(new_ant_comb)) {
00462                                                 status.selected_ant = new_ant_comb;
00463                                                 
00464                                                 antenna_ctrl_send_ant_data_to_bus();
00465                                                         
00466                                                 led_set_tx_ant(1,LED_STATE_OFF);
00467                                                 display_update(status.selected_band, status.selected_ant);
00468                                         }
00469                                         else {
00470                                                 if (antenna_ctrl_comb_allowed(new_ant_comb & 0xF0)) {
00471                                                         status.selected_ant = new_ant_comb & 0xF0;
00472                                                                 
00473                                                         antenna_ctrl_send_ant_data_to_bus();
00474                         
00475                                                         led_set_tx_ant(0,LED_STATE_OFF);
00476                                                         display_update(status.selected_band, status.selected_ant);
00477                                                 }
00478                                         }
00479                                 }
00480                                 else {
00481                                         new_ant_comb |= (1<<0);
00482                                                 
00483                                         if (antenna_ctrl_comb_allowed(new_ant_comb)) {
00484                                                 status.selected_ant = new_ant_comb;
00485                 
00486                                                 antenna_ctrl_send_ant_data_to_bus();
00487                                                         
00488                                                 led_set_tx_ant(1,LED_STATE_ON);
00489                                                 display_update(status.selected_band, status.selected_ant);
00490                                         }
00491                                         else {
00492                                                 if (antenna_ctrl_comb_allowed(new_ant_comb & 0xF1)) {
00493                                                         status.selected_ant = new_ant_comb & 0xF1;
00494                 
00495                                                         antenna_ctrl_send_ant_data_to_bus();
00496                         
00497                                                         led_set_tx_ant(0,LED_STATE_OFF);
00498                                                         led_set_tx_ant(1,LED_STATE_ON);
00499                                                         display_update(status.selected_band, status.selected_ant);
00500                                                 }
00501                                         }
00502                                 }
00503                         }
00504                         else {
00505                                 status.antenna_to_rotate = 1;
00506                                 status.function_status &= ~(1<<FUNC_STATUS_SELECT_ANT_ROTATE);
00507                                 
00508                                 status.new_beamheading = antenna_ctrl_get_direction(0);
00509                                 display_show_set_heading(status.new_beamheading, 0);
00510                                 
00511                                 set_tx_ant_leds();
00512                         }
00513                 }
00514                 
00515                 main_update_ptt_status();
00516         }
00517 }
00518 
00520 void event_tx_button2_pressed(void) {
00521         if (main_get_inhibit_state() != INHIBIT_NOT_OK_TO_SEND_RADIO_TX) {
00522                 if (antenna_ctrl_get_flags(1) & (1<<ANTENNA_EXIST_FLAG)) {
00523                         unsigned char new_ant_comb = status.selected_ant;
00524                         
00525                         if ((status.function_status & (1<<FUNC_STATUS_SELECT_ANT_ROTATE)) == 0) {
00526                                 if (status.selected_ant & (1<<1)) {
00527                                         new_ant_comb &= ~(1<<1);
00528                                                 
00529                                         if (antenna_ctrl_comb_allowed(new_ant_comb)) {
00530                                                 status.selected_ant = new_ant_comb;
00531                 
00532                                                 antenna_ctrl_send_ant_data_to_bus();
00533                                                         
00534                                                 led_set_tx_ant(2,LED_STATE_OFF);
00535                                                 display_update(status.selected_band, status.selected_ant);
00536                                         }
00537                                         else {
00538                                                 if (antenna_ctrl_comb_allowed(new_ant_comb & 0xF0)) {
00539                                                         status.selected_ant = new_ant_comb & 0xF0;
00540                         
00541                                                         antenna_ctrl_send_ant_data_to_bus();
00542                                                                 
00543                                                         led_set_tx_ant(0,LED_STATE_OFF);
00544                                                         display_update(status.selected_band, status.selected_ant);
00545                                                 }
00546                                         }
00547                                 }
00548                                 else {          
00549                                         new_ant_comb |= (1<<1);
00550                                                 
00551                                         if (antenna_ctrl_comb_allowed(new_ant_comb)) {
00552                                                 status.selected_ant = new_ant_comb;
00553                 
00554                                                 antenna_ctrl_send_ant_data_to_bus();
00555                                                         
00556                                                 led_set_tx_ant(2,LED_STATE_ON);
00557                                                 display_update(status.selected_band, status.selected_ant);
00558                                         }
00559                                         else {
00560                                                 if (antenna_ctrl_comb_allowed(new_ant_comb & 0xF2)) {
00561                                                         status.selected_ant = new_ant_comb & 0xF2;
00562                         
00563                                                         antenna_ctrl_send_ant_data_to_bus();
00564                                                                 
00565                                                         led_set_tx_ant(0,LED_STATE_OFF);
00566                                                         led_set_tx_ant(2,LED_STATE_ON);
00567                                                         display_update(status.selected_band, status.selected_ant);
00568                                                 }
00569                                         }
00570                                 }
00571                         } else {
00572                                 status.antenna_to_rotate = 2;
00573                                 status.function_status &= ~(1<<FUNC_STATUS_SELECT_ANT_ROTATE);
00574                                 
00575                                 status.new_beamheading = antenna_ctrl_get_direction(1);
00576                                 display_show_set_heading(status.new_beamheading, 0);
00577                                 
00578                                 set_tx_ant_leds();
00579                         }
00580                 }
00581                 
00582                 main_update_ptt_status();
00583         }
00584 }
00585 
00587 void event_tx_button3_pressed(void) {
00588         if (main_get_inhibit_state() != INHIBIT_NOT_OK_TO_SEND_RADIO_TX) {
00589                 if (antenna_ctrl_get_flags(2) & (1<<ANTENNA_EXIST_FLAG)) {
00590                         unsigned char new_ant_comb = status.selected_ant;
00591         
00592                         if ((status.function_status & (1<<FUNC_STATUS_SELECT_ANT_ROTATE)) == 0) {
00593                                 if (status.selected_ant & (1<<2)) {
00594                                         new_ant_comb &= ~(1<<2);
00595                                                 
00596                                         if (antenna_ctrl_comb_allowed(new_ant_comb)) {
00597                                                 status.selected_ant = new_ant_comb;
00598                 
00599                                                 antenna_ctrl_send_ant_data_to_bus();
00600                                                         
00601                                                 led_set_tx_ant(3,LED_STATE_OFF);
00602                                                 display_update(status.selected_band, status.selected_ant);
00603                                         }
00604                                         else {
00605                                                 if (antenna_ctrl_comb_allowed(new_ant_comb & 0xF0)) {
00606                                                         status.selected_ant = new_ant_comb & 0xF0;
00607                                                                 
00608                                                         antenna_ctrl_send_ant_data_to_bus();
00609                                                                 
00610                                                         led_set_tx_ant(0,LED_STATE_OFF);
00611                                                         display_update(status.selected_band, status.selected_ant);
00612                                                 }
00613                                         }
00614                                 }
00615                                 else {
00616                                         new_ant_comb |= (1<<2);
00617                                                 
00618                                         if (antenna_ctrl_comb_allowed(new_ant_comb)) {
00619                                                 status.selected_ant = new_ant_comb;
00620                 
00621                                                 antenna_ctrl_send_ant_data_to_bus();
00622                                                         
00623                                                 led_set_tx_ant(3,LED_STATE_ON);
00624                                                 display_update(status.selected_band, status.selected_ant);
00625                                         }
00626                                         else {
00627                                                 if (antenna_ctrl_comb_allowed(new_ant_comb & 0xF4)) {
00628                                                         status.selected_ant = new_ant_comb & 0xF4;
00629                         
00630                                                         antenna_ctrl_send_ant_data_to_bus();
00631                                                                 
00632                                                         led_set_tx_ant(0,LED_STATE_OFF);
00633                                                         led_set_tx_ant(3,LED_STATE_ON);
00634                                                         display_update(status.selected_band, status.selected_ant);
00635                                                 }
00636                                         }
00637                                 }
00638                         }
00639                         else {
00640                                 status.antenna_to_rotate = 3;
00641                                 status.function_status &= ~(1<<FUNC_STATUS_SELECT_ANT_ROTATE);
00642                                 
00643                                 status.new_beamheading = antenna_ctrl_get_direction(3);
00644                                 display_show_set_heading(status.new_beamheading, 0);
00645                                 
00646                                 set_tx_ant_leds();
00647                         }
00648                 }
00649                 
00650                 main_update_ptt_status();
00651         }
00652 }

00655 void event_tx_button4_pressed(void) {
00656         if (main_get_inhibit_state() != INHIBIT_NOT_OK_TO_SEND_RADIO_TX) {

00722 
00724 void event_aux2_button_pressed(void) {
00725         if ((runtime_settings.band_change_mode == BAND_CHANGE_MODE_MANUAL) || (radio_interface_get_interface() == RADIO_INTERFACE_BCD)) {
00726                 if (status.current_band_portion == BAND_HIGH)
00727                         status.new_band_portion = BAND_LOW;
00728                 else
00729                         status.new_band_portion = BAND_HIGH;
00730 
00731                 if (status.new_band_portion != status.current_band_portion) {
00732                         status.current_band_portion = status.new_band_portion;
00733                                 
00734                         display_update_radio_freq();
00735                         band_ctrl_change_band_portion(status.current_band_portion);
00736                 }
00737         }
00738 }
00739 
00741 void event_sub_button_pressed(void) {
00742         if (status.buttons_current_state & (1<<FLAG_BUTTON_SUBMENU_BIT)) {
00743                 if (sub_menu_get_count() != 0) {
00744                         if ((status.function_status & (1<<FUNC_STATUS_SUBMENU)) == 0) {
00745                                 led_set_submenu(LED_STATE_ON);
00746                                 status.function_status |= (1<<FUNC_STATUS_SUBMENU);
00747                                 set_knob_function(KNOB_FUNCTION_SET_SUBMENU);
00748                                                         
00749                                 if (sub_menu_get_count() == 1) {
00750                                         for (unsigned char i=0;i<4;i++)
00751                                                 if (antenna_ctrl_get_sub_menu_type(i) == SUBMENU_VERT_ARRAY)
00752                                                         status.sub_menu_antenna_index = i;
00753                                         
00754                                         status.current_display_level = DISPLAY_LEVEL_SUBMENU;
00755                                         
00756                                         glcd_clear();
00757                                         display_show_sub_menu(status.sub_menu_antenna_index, SUBMENU_VERT_ARRAY);
00758                                 }
00759                         }
00760                         else {
00761                                 led_set_submenu(LED_STATE_OFF);
00762                                 status.function_status &= ~(1<<FUNC_STATUS_SUBMENU);
00763                                 set_knob_function(KNOB_FUNCTION_AUTO);
00764                                 
00765                                 status.current_display_level = DISPLAY_LEVEL_BAND;
00766                                 
00767                                 glcd_clear();
00768                                 main_update_display();
00769                         }
00770                 }
00771                 else {
00772                         //Make sure that no sub menu stuff is used
00773                         led_set_submenu(LED_STATE_OFF);
00774                         status.function_status &= ~(1<<FUNC_STATUS_SUBMENU);
00775                         set_knob_function(KNOB_FUNCTION_AUTO);
00776                 }
00777         }
00778 }
00779 
00781 void event_rxant_button_pressed(void) {
00782         if (status.buttons_current_state & (1<<FLAG_BUTTON_RXANT_BIT)) {
00783                 if (antenna_ctrl_get_rx_antenna_count() != 0) {
00784                                 
00785                                 //If the RX ANT isn't active we enter this part, also if the rx antenna is active but knob selection is on another function
00786                         if (((status.function_status & (1<<FUNC_STATUS_RXANT)) == 0) || ((status.function_status & (1<<FUNC_STATUS_RXANT)) && (status.knob_function != KNOB_FUNCTION_RX_ANT))) {
00787                                 status.selected_rx_antenna = status.last_rx_antenna;
00788                                 
00789                                 //If no antenna is selected, then we select the first one, or if the selected rx antenna for some reason is more than the number of antennas available.
00790                                 if ((status.selected_rx_antenna == 0) || (status.selected_rx_antenna > antenna_ctrl_get_rx_antenna_count()))
00791                                         status.selected_rx_antenna = 1;
00792                                 
00793                                 status.function_status |= (1<<FUNC_STATUS_RXANT);
00794                                 
00795                                 led_set_rxant(LED_STATE_ON);
00796                                         
00797                                 main_flags |= (1<<FLAG_UPDATE_DISPLAY);
00798                                         
00799                                 antenna_ctrl_change_rx_ant(status.selected_rx_antenna);
00800                                         
00801                                 set_knob_function(KNOB_FUNCTION_RX_ANT);
00802                         }
00803                         else {
00804                                 led_set_rxant(LED_STATE_OFF);
00805                                 led_set_rotate(LED_STATE_OFF);
00806                                         
00807                                 set_knob_function(KNOB_FUNCTION_AUTO);
00808                                         
00809                                 status.last_rx_antenna = status.selected_rx_antenna;
00810                                 status.selected_rx_antenna = 0;
00811                                 antenna_ctrl_change_rx_ant(0);
00812 
00813                                 status.function_status &= ~(1<<FUNC_STATUS_RXANT);
00814                                 main_flags |= (1<<FLAG_UPDATE_DISPLAY);
00815                         }
00816                 }
00817                 else    //If we don't have any antennas to choose we always have the LED off
00818                         led_set_rxant(LED_STATE_OFF);
00819         }
00820 }
00821 
00823 void event_rotate_button_pressed(void) {
00824         unsigned char rotator_count=0, rotator_index=0;
00825         
00826         for (unsigned char i=0;i<4;i++)
00827                 if (antenna_ctrl_get_flags(i) & (1<<ANTENNA_ROTATOR_FLAG)) {
00828                         rotator_count++;
00829                         
00830                         //This variable is used if only one antenna has got a rotator
00831                         rotator_index = i;
00832                 }
00833                 
00834         if (rotator_count > 0) {
00835                 if (status.buttons_current_state & (1<<FLAG_BUTTON_ROTATE_BIT)) {
00836                         if (((status.function_status & (1<<FUNC_STATUS_ROTATE)) == 0) || ((status.function_status & (1<<FUNC_STATUS_ROTATE)) && (status.knob_function != KNOB_FUNCTION_SET_HEADING))) {
00837                                 if (rotator_count == 1) {
00838                                         status.antenna_to_rotate = rotator_index+1;
00839                                         status.function_status &= ~(1<<FUNC_STATUS_SELECT_ANT_ROTATE);
00840                                 
00841                                         status.new_beamheading = antenna_ctrl_get_direction(rotator_index);
00842                                         set_knob_function(KNOB_FUNCTION_SET_HEADING);
00843                                         
00844                                         display_show_set_heading(status.new_beamheading, 0);    
00845                                 }
00846                                 else {
00847                                         led_set_rotate(LED_STATE_ON);
00848                                         status.function_status |= (1<<FUNC_STATUS_ROTATE);
00849                                         set_knob_function(KNOB_FUNCTION_SET_HEADING);
00850                                                 
00851                                         status.function_status |= (1<<FUNC_STATUS_SELECT_ANT_ROTATE);
00852                                 }
00853                         }
00854                         else {
00855                                 led_set_rotate(LED_STATE_OFF);
00856                                 status.function_status &= ~(1<<FUNC_STATUS_ROTATE);
00857                                         
00858                                 status.function_status &= ~(1<<FUNC_STATUS_SELECT_ANT_ROTATE);
00859                                 status.antenna_to_rotate = 0;
00860                                 set_tx_ant_leds();
00861                                         
00862                                 set_knob_function(KNOB_FUNCTION_AUTO);
00863                                         
00864                                 glcd_clear();
00865                                 main_update_display();
00866                         }
00867                 }
00868         }
00869 }
00870 
00872 void event_bus_parse_message(void) {
00873         BUS_MESSAGE bus_message = rx_queue_get();
00874         
00875         #ifdef DEBUG_WMV_BUS
00876                 printf("DEBUG-> From addr: 0x%02X\n",bus_message.from_addr);
00877                 printf("DEBUG-> To addr:   0x%02X\n",bus_message.to_addr);
00878                 printf("DEBUG-> Command:   0x%02X\n",bus_message.cmd);
00879                 printf("DEBUG-> Length:    0x%02X\n",bus_message.length);
00880         
00881                 for (unsigned char i=0;i<bus_message.length;i++)
00882                         printf("DEBUG-> Data #%02i:  0x%02X\n",i,bus_message.data[i]);
00883         #endif
00884         
00885         if (bus_message.cmd == BUS_CMD_ACK)
00886                 bus_message_acked(bus_message.from_addr);
00887         else if (bus_message.cmd == BUS_CMD_NACK)
00888                 bus_message_nacked(bus_message.from_addr, bus_message.data[0]);
00889 
00890         //Drop the message
00891         rx_queue_drop();
00892         
00893         #ifdef DEBUG_WMV_BUS
00894                 printf("DEBUG-> Message dropped\n");
00895         #endif  
00896 }
00897 
00900 void event_parse_ext_event(unsigned int ext_event_status) {
00901         if (ext_event_status & (1<<STATUS_FOOTSWITCH_BIT)) {
00902                 if (status.ext_devices_current_state & (1<<STATUS_FOOTSWITCH_BIT))
00903                         sequencer_footsw_released();
00904                 else
00905                         sequencer_footsw_pressed();
00906         }
00907         
00908         if (ext_event_status & (1<<STATUS_USB2_RTS_BIT)) {
00909                 if (status.ext_devices_current_state & (1<<STATUS_USB2_RTS_BIT)) {
00910                         if (sequencer_get_rts_polarity() == 0)
00911                                 sequencer_computer_rts_activated();
00912                         else
00913                                 sequencer_computer_rts_deactivated();
00914                 }
00915                 else {
00916                         if (sequencer_get_rts_polarity() == 0)
00917                                 sequencer_computer_rts_deactivated();
00918                         else
00919                                 sequencer_computer_rts_activated();
00920                 }
00921         }
00922         
00923         if (sequencer_get_radio_sense() == 0) {
00924                 if (ext_event_status & (1<<STATUS_RADIO_SENSE1_BIT)) {
00925                         if (status.ext_devices_current_state & (1<<STATUS_RADIO_SENSE1_BIT)) {
00926                                 if (sequencer_get_sense_polarity() == 0)
00927                                         sequencer_radio_sense_deactivated();
00928                                 else
00929                                         sequencer_radio_sense_activated();
00930                         }
00931                         else {
00932                                 if (sequencer_get_sense_polarity() == 0)
00933                                         sequencer_radio_sense_activated();
00934                                 else
00935                                         sequencer_radio_sense_deactivated();
00936                         }
00937                 }       
00938         }
00939         else {
00940                 if (ext_event_status & (1<<STATUS_RADIO_SENSE2_BIT)) {
00941                         if (status.ext_devices_current_state & (1<<STATUS_RADIO_SENSE2_BIT)) {
00942                                 if (sequencer_get_sense_polarity() == 0)
00943                                         sequencer_radio_sense_deactivated();
00944                                 else
00945                                         sequencer_radio_sense_activated();
00946                         }
00947                         else {
00948                                 if (sequencer_get_sense_polarity() == 0)
00949                                         sequencer_radio_sense_activated();
00950                                 else
00951                                         sequencer_radio_sense_deactivated();
00952                         }
00953                 }
00954         }
00955 }
